mapper.update: update event_type set EVT_TYPE_NBR = #{evtTypeNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVT_TYPE_NAME = #{evtTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAR_EVT_TYPE_ID = #{parEvtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_TYPE_DESC = #{evtTypeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where EVT_TYPE_ID = #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_TYPE_NBR, EVT_TYPE_NAME, PAR_EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_type where EVT_TYPE_ID = #{evtTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_TYPE_NBR, EVT_TYPE_NAME, PAR_EVT_TYPE_ID, EVT_TYPE_DESC, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from event_type
